sentence.Network_en: She playfully rubs suntan lotion on his neck.
sentence.Network_cn: 她开玩笑地把防晒露擦到他脖子上。
她开玩笑般地把他推开了。
她顽皮地弄乱他的头发。

list.abs: said the mother , half playfully ;, 母亲半开玩笑地说;

entry.tran: （姿态或人）嬉戏的，闹着玩的，不当真的
entry.def: A playful gesture or person is friendly or humorous.

example.ex: ...a playful kiss on the tip of his nose.

entry.def: A playful animal is lively and cheerful.

sentences.sentence: "she loosened the half-hoop of diamonds on her left hand third finger and held it out to him playfully"

sentences.en: He pinched the boy’s face playfully.
sentences.cn: 他开玩笑地拧了这男孩的脸。

sentences.en: She nudged him playfully in the ribs.
sentences.cn: 她开玩笑地用胳膊肘触了触他的肋骨。
